description: Most of Sam's friends will visit the website on their phones, but some of his friends is really hard core gamers. They have desktop computers with ultra wide monitors and Sam doesn't want the site to look strange on them. What if there was a way to load the small image on small screens, and the large image on large screens...?
todo: Add a srcset attribute containing the link to the large image.

correct.headline: srcset is the way to go!
correct.text: That's a step in the right direction! But we need to help Sam a bit more...

wrong.headline: We need the srcset!
wrong.text: Something is missing! Did you add the srcset attribute with a link to birthday_large.jpg?
